name: @ops-dss/data-r
description: R package for processing DSS health indicators

scripts.r:process-indicators: docker-compose run --rm r-dev bash -c 'Rscript /workspace/packages/data-r/setup.R && cd /workspace/packages/data-r && RENV_CONFIG_AUTOLOADER_ENABLED=FALSE Rscript -e "library(dss.indicators); process_indicator(\"chronic_malnutrition_under5\")"'
scripts.r:process-single: docker-compose run --rm r-dev bash -c 'Rscript /workspace/packages/data-r/setup.R && cd /workspace/packages/data-r && RENV_CONFIG_AUTOLOADER_ENABLED=FALSE Rscript -e "library(dss.indicators); process_indicator(\"chronic_malnutrition_under5\")"'
